content: Yes, it's crucial to have stability and predictability in the global trade environment to promote economic growth and prosperity. Many countries realize that sustained economic growth depends on an open, transparent, and fair international trade system. They recognize that protectionist policies can lead to a vicious circle of retaliatory measures, which can escalate into a trade war, and that it's essential to work together to avoid such a scenario. It's commendable that many countries have recognized the importance of working together, and hopefully, their efforts can lead to a more stable global trade environment that benefits everyone.
